name: Glow Air Hockey
description:
Glow Air Hockey is pure hockey fun! Play Glow Air Hockey against the AI or your friends. Use your finger to move the Hockey pad and hit the puck to score goals. Glow Air Hockey is the classic air hockey game with incredibly realistic physics. The graphic style of Glow Air Hockey is also amazing. You can change the color of the pads or the puck with just one button.
Download Glow Air Hockey now, and start playing some air hockey with your friends!

Features:

- Great hockey physics.
- Nice graphics.
- 2 player mode.
- Lots of fun!
